text: (napiye!) Niccayamaka um'mutaiya ivain manitarkalaic culntu kontirukkinran enru umakkuk kuriyatai (ninaivu kurviraka! Mihrajin potu) nam umakkukkattiya katciyaiyum kur'anil capikkappattum (jakkum) marattaiyum manitarkalukku cotanaiyakave tavira nam akkavillai. Innum nam avarkalai accuruttukinrom; anal, itu avarkalutaiya perum aliccattiyattaiye atikarikkac ceykinratu
